action_item.title: Manage everything on your business website
action_item.desc: Make content changes to all the pages of your website including business information, contact details, latest updates, products/services etc.

action_item.title: All your business enquiries and interactions
action_item.desc: Manage all your customer enquiries like messages, calls and appointments or orders. Respond to the enquiries, fullfit online orders, call back to the customers, add loyal customers to your newsletters etc.

action_item.title: Explore premium features to get most out of Boost
action_item.desc: Find what all digital add-ons that can help you grow your business digitally. add-ons such as call tracker, a new website domain and many more relevant to your business category.
